subNodes.conversationText: root
Welcome friends to Glenfax Tower.
Continue
I assume you are here to inquire on how to become a member of the Glenfax Guild.
What are the requirements?
We require you to perform a deed that shows your loyalty to the Guild.
What might this deed be?
Normally, it would be something of the pillaging nature.
Continue
But at the moment we have a greater need.
Continue
A Lizard Queen of sorts has invaded our territory and threatens our Guild.
Continue
She has poisoned our water supply.  We now must venture near her lair to gather fresh water.
Continue
Many have not returned from this task.
Continue
We would ask you to deal with this threat.
We have already met and dealt with this Lizard Queen of yours.  We defeated her and removed the source of poisoning.
Outstanding, I guess it was easier than I thought.
I wouldn't say it was easy.
Easy for us.  Anyway, it is unfortunate for you as we can not let you leave, now that you know of our location.
I figured it would probably end this way.
Sorry bud, them's the rules around here...
Battle Begins...
We promise not to tell a soul.
Sorry bud, them's the rules around here...
Battle Begins...
Have it your way...Draw steel friends, time to shut this guild down.
kill them...
Battle Begins...
Easy for us, but probably would've been difficult for you.
We shall see.  Unfortunately for you, we can't let you leave, now that you know of our location.
I figured it would probably end this way.
We promise not to tell a soul.
Have it your way...Draw steel friends, time to shut this guild down.
That should be easy enough.  What do we get for such an act?
Membership in the Guild, of course.  If you survive, return here and let us know how it went.
Farewell.
We came here to remove the cause of the river's poisoning.  If you benefit as well, so be it.
Perfect.  If you survive, return here and let us know how it went.
Why haven't you dealt with her yourself?
We are in the process of planning an attack, but since you are here, maybe you could soften them up a bit.
Sounds like fun.  We'll see what we can do.
Perfect.  If you survive, return here and let us know how it went.
Farewell.
Good luck, you'll need it.
End Dialog
I'm sorry, but we're not interested in helping you out.
That is most unfortunate for you as we can not let you leave, knowing our location.
I figured it would probably end this way.
We promise not to tell a soul.
Have it your way...Draw steel friends, time to shut this guild down.
Speak swiftly and carefully.  Are you the source of the river's poisoning?
No, but I know where you should look.
Continue
A Lizard Queen of sorts has invaded our territory and threatens our Guild.
I'm sorry, but we're not interested in joining your pathetic Guild.
That is most unfortunate for you as we can not let you leave, knowing our location.
I figured it would probably end this way.
We promise not to tell a soul.
Have it your way...Draw steel friends, time to shut this guild down.
Actually, no.  We're here to find the source of poisoning of the river.
I know of this source you speak of.
Continue
A Lizard Queen of sorts has invaded our territory and threatens our Guild.
Have you taken care of that Lizard Queen yet?
Not yet, we're still working on it.
Have you taken care of that Lizard Queen yet?
We were able to defeat her and remove the source of poisoning.
Outstanding, I guess it was easier than I thought.
Thank you again for saving us.
End Dialog
Greetings and safe travels.
End Dialog
